item.title: Flags attribute for enums
item.description: Daily Knowledge Drop The Flags attribute can be used to automatically treat an enum as a set of flags (a bit field) - flags are useful when elements in the enum might occur in combinations. Bitwise operations Often an enum will have values of 0, 1, 2, 4, 8, 16 .. instead of 0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 .. - this is because it allows bitwise operations to be performed on the enum.
